name: Belinda Yealy
text: The location is clean, has a very friendly & helpful staff, great food! My daughter & I had a small Supreme Taco Pie, salad bar, mini Classic Combo, mini Veggie & sodas. Godfather's left Las Vegas, Nevada area years ago, so the manager â€¦More

name: Chad Roby
text: There is a negative sign in front of the 2 stars I put down. I grew up in the Midwest where this company started and this would make William go somewhere else for pizza. Started with me walking in and waiting over 5 minutes before to ladies â€¦More

text: The food here is great so is the staff and facility but they charge 2.50 for delivery and expect a tip i think not! Ive ordered delivery from u since u opened and now you charge this... next time I order from you is if i have no other â€¦More

name: Mom B
text: These people were great! We showed up starving, 7 people, 30 minutes before closing. We had been to a high school event nearby. They weren't put out by our late arrival and treated us kindly. Excellent workers.

name: Nikki Nova Tarot
text:
Such WONDERFUL pizza!! I remember when all pizza used to taste like Godfathers... Highly recommend
I've also never had a problem with having to wait for it or my pizza being cold â€¦More

text: Pizza was not fully cooked or the cheese bread and the service was horrible and he refused to refill the soda after we bought 2 large fountain sodas!! Horrible experience and the food was worse!

name: Kirsten Shoulders
text: First off when we walked in it reminded me of my childhood. Then the service was awesome and the pizza was even better! We will definitely return when we are in the area!

text: My beloved loved the pizza. The cashier told me they had Gatorade in the drink foundation, and they didn't. It was just a weird visit

text: This has been one of the worst experiences ever. The salad bar was so sparse the lettuce was wilted and the tomatoes were soggy. There was only 3 very cold very dry pizzas out absolutely no dessert pizzas or pastas or any other choices. We â€¦More

text: Great Pizza! Delicious toppings! Excellent crust! Gotta have the monkey bread for dessert! The taco pizza is Awesome!

name: Apollo Silva
text: Good food and very friendly staff all around. The dining area is small and pleasant with a pretty view of the city. Buffet is very filling and the salad bar was nice and fresh.

text:
Pizza was good.
Don't get the buffet! NOTHING was fresh, and they were out of lettuce! Also I asked if they could fix the coke machine. I just ended up not getting to drink â€¦More

name: Michael White
text: I've been to this place for several meals. The first two times were excellent. Today at 1130... Two pizza selections, salad bar was almost frozen.  I'd like to see more godfathers... But not of this poor quality... Poor service.

text: I walked in to this place very hungry. I waited 15 minutes for someone to come and take my order. The register was unattended. When someone did come out. I place my order for a large all meat with stuffed crust. Then the register woman â€¦More

text: Well we spent the day at high school baseball games all day!! We said when it was over we we're going to have pizza & beer!! We all arrive very exhausted & told they no longer sell beer because their liquor licence expired!! So I order the â€¦More

text: Ordered on grubhub, Mediterranean salad, in the description of ingredients it states "roasted chicken strips" paid $14.99 + grubhub $3.99 + tip $3.69. Didnt get chicken so a salad for $22 with NO CHICKEN!! I called the store and explained â€¦More

name: Joshua Ridens
text: They took an awfully long time to get the pizza finished. They estimated about 40 minutes, but it actually took them 70. In addition to being late they messed the order up, and to top it off their customer service was terrible. A simple, â€¦More

text: I was taking my son to get pizza for his birthday and the person at the register told us "sorry guys... got to go to my other job...so I got to closed early ..ðŸ˜¡.so much for service ...I guess the other job pays better.... Totally bad experience.

name: Angie Gomez
text: I want here with my family I will never go to this location again the service was horrible you have to wait till food is gone off the buffet in order them to make you a new pizza on the buffet which I did not understand waited forever for â€¦More

text: Yummy. Thick, filling, fresh and oh so tasty. Monday large pizza for $10 (i think).

text: 100% great pizza! 4 stars because the apple dessert we ordered was not cooked completely.

name: Jerry Gonzales
text: First time last time. Go to our call any other pizza place. Took us an hour and a half when we live maybe ten minutes away and a supposed 40 min delivery time. Pizza was cold by the time it got here and by my taste not even up to par with â€¦More

name: Laurence Jared
text: Order on line and have been waiting for over an hour for a small pizza and wedges. I had to call them to find out they don't have any wedges and I am still waiting for the pizza. If I could give them a negative number for customer service it would be -10. They had my number and could have called.

name: Carlos Salas
text: I tried this place once because my girlfriend felt like having pizza. It was the closest place that I could think of. We ordered waited about 50 min for our SMALL pizza. It wasn't bad pizza it was actually really good. Definately not worth â€¦More

text:
About A month ago I went there And no one waited on me no one was behind the counter.
There appeared to be a manager sitting out in the dining room folding tent â€¦More

name: George Torres
text: Bit over priced, but GOOD pizza! I Uber Eats this place passing through. (Driving coast to coast) Pizza came perfect eating temp. Do a little better on pricing, and this place would be a SMASH! 4 STARS because of high cost of pizza

name: Melissa D
text: First & last time eating here! Tastes worse than frozen store pizza, as other reviews said we would have been happier with a $5 Caesar's pizza. Got our order wrong to top it off after driving far to go pick up. Response was bring it back to â€¦More

name: LaShanna Villanueva
text: Worst $22dollors ever spent!..Pizza was cold and old..such a sad sald bar selection and i dont know why cashier was stuffing cash into her shirt walking away from register but food and service was horrible..i dont know how they are still open for business! Dont waste your money!

text: I come here once before it was okay but today I came nobody waited on us. By the time the pizza arrived it was cold and we have so much grease dripping off we could feel a cup worst pizza place I've ever been to

text: Great customer service ! Pizza is always great.  Albuquerque is lucky to have this location on the West side

name: James Mariano
text: The service is good and the pizza was great. The restaurant is a little cold.

name: David
text: If you are on the westside and need some pizza Godfather's pizza is a good place to call in and pick up . If you plan to eat inside a full salad bar is at your disposal. A worth a try pizza if you are that side of town .

name: Brian Duncan
text: Took my kids in for the lunch buffett. We were very disappointed. Salad bar was not fully stocked. They only had 7 pizzas to pick from but there were only 4 varieties of pizza. The employees spent more time in the back of the restaurant than up front taking care of customers.

name: Abdul Jemal
text:
Good customer service I ate salad but I will like to seat in the booth there were some left over foods on the table in all booth places from previous customers
Overall it's ok

name: Phillip Holcomb
text: Well I got a mini size, & I paid over 12 buck for it. And 3 hours later my stomach could not handle it anymore so it was all over the parking lot at the Flying J. I will never go back there every again

name: Johnny G
text: We just finished our first pizzas from Godfathers after they left Albuquerque 20 some odd years ago. I used to work there and always loved thier pizza. I'm here to tell you..IT IS JUST AS GOOD AS IT USED TO BE. My wife and I ordered our old â€¦More

text: Well the reviews are correct they mess the order big time. And they are slow I guess they can't read or understand.  Basically I think they just make whatever they want and your going to take it.  Oh well

text: My daughter and I tried placing an order on the Internet, the app isn't user friendly. So we called, they said 25 minutes. Well it took over 45 minutes because somebody else's order got in front of mine. This store sucks!!!

name: Albert Chavez
text: Everytime I order from this place they are always at least 20 minutes late, and mess up the order. One time they even messed up the order twice in a row on one day. Their pizza is very overpriced and basically tastes the same as any other â€¦More
